name: Energy nodes
description:
"Energy nodes" is the perfect strategy game with moderate difficulty for a wide range of ages and tastes. Many levels are waiting for you to complete them as quickly and as quickly as possible.
In this game each level presents a series of points that you must connect following a simple normal. The points must be joined without going through the same line twice, that is, each time you connect two points to form a line, that line turns green, because you can not go through that green line again.
When you complete levels, you will be given 0 to 3 stars, your goal is to achieve the maximum possible stars. The number of stars depends on how fast you do the levels, so make them as fast as possible.

What to expect:

-Various levels to play, with increasing difficulty.

-Small tutorial at the begining of the game to help the player understand the game.

-Good game for all ages and tastes, with challenging gameplay.

How to play:

-You just need your mouse to navigate through the menu and to play.
